attributes.action: Let the decision to leave the EU count it should not be re-voted on!
attributes.additional_details: What is the point of it ? are we going to keep  on asking for it to be done over and over again no one is ever going to be happy at the present moment in time we have at least another 2 years before we are completely out of the EU, so why not wait and see what happens instead of keep up this voting which costs money! which could be used on soemething else like the NHS!
attributes.background:
Why should the remain voters be allowed to have another referendum to leave because they are upset they lost ? 
If the people who voted out had lost and we was to remain in the EU that would have been the end of it!
